text: Johnny Rozsa is a well known New York photographer. Rozsa was born and raised in Nairobi, and is of Jewish descent.Absolutely Now!: A Futurist's Journey to Her Inner Truth. Lynne Franks. London: Century, 1997. He arrived in London in the 1960s and, after college, ran a vintage shop in Covent Garden. Here he met fashion editors, models, actors, and photographers on a daily basis. Rozsa photographed famous people including Hugh Grant, Halle Berry, Janet Jackson, Nicholas Cage, John Malkovich and Natasha Richardson. Rozsa published a book in 2009 called Untouched, which included many of his photographs. == References == ==Other websites== *Official website Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:African Jews Category:American Jews Category:American photographers Category:British Jews Category:British photographers Category:Jewish artists Category:Naturalised citizens of the United Kingdom Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:People from Nairobi
title: Johnny Rozsa
